Package org.cast.cwm.data.component

Class Summary
AjaxCancelChangesDialog TODO: This is too specific.
AjaxDeletePersistedObjectDialog<T extends PersistedObject> A dialog for deleting a Object from the datastore.
BasicResponseArea A basic panel that provides a location to create responses to a prompt and a list of those responses, each of which can be edited.
DeletePersistedObjectDialog<T extends PersistedObject> A dialog for deleting a Object from the datastore.
DialogBorder A Styled modal dialog popup box.
DisablingAjaxCallDecorator Disable the provided components during an ajax call.
DisablingIndicatingAjaxButton An instance of IndicatingAjaxButton that can disable components during the AJAX request.
DisablingIndicatingAjaxFallbackLink<T> An instance of IndicatingAjaxFallbackLink that can disable components during the AJAX request.
DisablingIndicatingAjaxLink<T> An instance of IndicatingAjaxLink that can disable components during the AJAX request.
DisablingIndicatingAjaxSubmitLink An instance of AjaxSubmitLink that can disable components during the AJAX request AND display an Indicator, since there is no such thing as IndicatingAjaxSubmitLink.
FeedbackBorder  
FormComponentContainer This class wraps a FormComponent in a feedback border, adds a label for the component, and acts as an enclosure if the form component is not visible.
GravatarImage A class for converting e-mail strings into md5 hash strings for use with Gravatar.
HibernateEditPeriodForm<T extends Period>  
LogoutLink  
MultipleFileUploadField This is a re-creation of MultiFileUploadField.
PeriodChoice A DropDownChoice of Periods.
ResponseEditor Base class for editing any type of response.
ResponseViewer A simple panel for viewing a response.
SessionExpireWarningDialog Add this to any page that should warn the user when their session is going to expire.
StarPanel Basic Star Rating Panel This is essentially both a ResponseEditor and ResponseViewer for a ResponseType.STAR_RATING.
SvgImage Display an SVG Image.
SvgUploadExtensionImpl  
UserChoice A DropDownChoice of Users.
WavResource Resource that will return the audio data of a ResponseData object, converted to WAV format.
